data.title: I support the Writer's Guild of America

summary.content: I just wanted to say that I fully, completely, and entirely support the WGA in their strike against Big Media. If you haven’t checked it out, take a look at United Hollywood and sign the petition! This video explains what’s going on, and why it’s so very important that the Writer’s Guild wins this battle against the media companies.

If you haven’t checked it out, take a look at [United Hollywood]({{% wayback "http://unitedhollywood.blogspot.com/" %}}) and [sign the petition!]({{% wayback "http://www.msplinks.com/MDFodHRwOi8vd3d3LlBldGl0aW9uT25saW5lLmNvbS9XR0EvcGV0aXRpb24uaHRtbA==" %}}) This video explains what’s going on, and why it’s so very important that the Writer’s Guild wins this battle against the media companies.
